function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear communication of data analysis results","Impact":"Misinterpretation of results may lead to incorrect decisions","Mitigation":"Provide clear and detailed explanations of the data analysis methods and results","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, clear communication strategies","People":"Project team members, public agencies, owner/developer, company","Owner":"Project team members, data analysts, communication specialists"},{"Description":"Unrecognized relationships between categorical variables","Impact":"Failure to identify important associations in the dataset","Mitigation":"Use advanced statistical methods and visualization techniques to explore and identify relationships","Technologies":"Correspondence analysis (CA), chi-square test, data visualization tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers, project team members","Owner":"Data analysts, researchers"},{"Description":"Inferential misuse of descriptive data analysis methods","Impact":"Misinterpretation of results leading to incorrect hypothesis testing","Mitigation":"Provide training on the appropriate use of descriptive data analysis methods and inferential statistics","Technologies":"Training programs, statistical software with built-in guidance on method usage","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, educational institutions"}]}
